title: Hamburger
instructions: Preheat a frying pan on the oven on medium heat
Form the ground beef into patty shape
Rub 1/8 cup olive oil over the surface of the formed patty, then sprinkle with 1 tsp salt and 1 tsp pepper
Place the seasoned burger on the heated frying pan
Allow to cook until the bottom is browned and half the patty has changed color, then flip the burger
Place cheese on the burger, and leave on the pan until the burger is cooked through and reaches an internal temp of 160 degrees F
Place on a sliced bun and enjoy.
